com.novell.ldapchai
Interface ChaiGroup

All Superinterfaces:
ChaiEntry
public interface ChaiGroup
extends ChaiEntry

Represents an ldap group entry.

Instances of ChaiGroup can be obtained by using ChaiFactory.

Author:
Jason D. Rivard

Method Detail

addMember

void addMember(ChaiUser theUser)
               throws ChaiUnavailableException,
                      ChaiOperationException
Make the passed in user a member of this group. This method takes care of all four attribute assignments used in eDirectory static groups.

Parameters:
theUser - The user to assign to this group's membership list.
Throws:
ChaiOperationException - If there is an error during the operation
ChaiUnavailableException - If the directory server(s) are unavailable
See Also:
ChaiUser.addGroupMembership(ChaiGroup)

getMembers

Set<ChaiUser> getMembers()
                         throws ChaiOperationException,
                                ChaiUnavailableException
Get a Set of ChaiUser instances that are members of this group.

Returns:
Set of ChaiUser objects. If there are no members, then an empty Set will be returned.
Throws:
ChaiOperationException - If there is an error during the operation
ChaiUnavailableException - If the directory server(s) are unavailable

readGroupName

String readGroupName()
                     throws ChaiOperationException,
                            ChaiUnavailableException
Convienence method to read this ChaiUser instance's ATTR_GROUP_NAME attribute.

Returns:
The value of the attribute, or null if no value
Throws:
ChaiOperationException - If there is an error during the operation
ChaiUnavailableException - If the directory server(s) are unavailable

removeMember

void removeMember(ChaiUser theUser)
                  throws ChaiUnavailableException,
                         ChaiOperationException
Remove the passed in user from being a member of this group. This method takes care of all four attribute assignments used in eDirectory static groups.

Parameters:
theUser - The user to remove from this group's membership list.
Throws:
ChaiOperationException - If there is an error during the operation
ChaiUnavailableException - If the directory server(s) are unavailable
See Also:
ChaiUser.removeGroupMembership(ChaiGroup)
